creator.description:
Mission: put Elmo's X frens in a silo
Startup admin: stevetownsend0.bsky.social
Appeals: admin@nafo-moderation.org
Read Pinned post for mission
Follow for irregular Delphic pronouncements
Committed to no use of !hide !warn etc
12 hour SLA target

locales.description: Apparent inauthentic profile, likely or visibly part of a bot or troll network.
locales.name: Network Member

locales.description: Known for mixing unreliable posts with factual content. Not an overt 60/40 propagandist. Requires critical thinking to engage safely.
locales.name: Exercise Caution

locales.description: Account blocks moderation. Exercise caution and critical thinking. Other labels may be present if reliably reported.
locales.name: Blocks Moderation

locales.description: Ban evaders, multiple account holders, or using obfuscation to post slurs or other covered content
locales.name: Evasion

locales.description: Violent speech including media. Threats, incitement, celebration, wishing harm.
locales.name: Violent Content

locales.description: Gratuitously graphic media, violent or sexual content. Typically, also report to platform.
locales.name: Graphic Media

locales.description: Impersonating community member or other well-known account. Beware of fundraising links or unsolicited DMs.
locales.name: Fake Account

locales.description: Repetitive behaviour, including spamming the same reply or image
locales.name: Repetitive

locales.description: Account is well-known as a spreader of disinformation, or  post contains disinformation. Includes denial of documented events. Includes known 60/40 disinfo mixers.
locales.name: Disinformation

locales.description: Non-harmful parody account, labeled only to avoid confusion and distraction
locales.name: Parody

locales.description: Unconstructive conflict within the fella community, or outside attack, possibly designed to distract from more important things. Includes low-reach 60/40 disinfo mixers. Includes community interfering with Ukrainians' management of their infospace.
locales.name: Disruptive

locales.description: Rude or impolite, including crude language and disrespectful comments, without constructive purpose.
locales.name: Abusive

locales.description: Insincere content or bulk actions aimed at gaining followers, including frequent follows, posts, and likes. Beware of off-site links.
locales.name: Engagement Farmer
